predicate.note: Frames file for 'chant' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus.

roleset.name: to recite as a chant, intone

example.name: transitive
example.text: In the stands , people waved ANC flags , wore ANC T-shirts , sang ANC songs and chanted ANC slogans .

example.name: another transitive
example.text: The protesters who [*T*-1] greeted Mikhail Gorbachev at East Berlin 's airport earlier this month were n't shouting `` Go U.S.A '' -- they were chanting `` Gorby , [*] Help Us . ''
